resources.string:
Dressed up, or dressed down. Complete our Quimby dress with fresh white sneakers for an easy laid back look.
 
 ITEM DETAILS
 -Woven detail at collar, pocket flaps, and waistband
 -Full button through detail at center front placket
 - Horn Buttons
 
 FABRIC DETAILS
 -We worked long and hard to come up with a fabric that would look like a woven but give you the comfort of a knit.
 The result was our Made for Movement Hudson Twill. It is super comfortable, soft, does not wrinkle, and moves with you.
 - All our fabrics are made in a mill that is Oeko-Tex certified,
 So you can be assured that the chemicals used to treat the fabrics are not harmful to the environment.
 
 SIZE FIT
 -Model is 5'10" wearing a size 1, equivalent to a size small
 -Size small measures 34" in length -95% Cotton 5% Spandex.
 Imported.
Helena Dress in Brownie Buffalo Check
